articles.author: Charlotte Graham-mclay and Rod Mcguirk, Associated Press
articles.title: Australian mushroom cook is convicted of triple murder after serving a fatal beef Wellington lunch - KSL News
articles.description: Australian woman Erin Patterson was found guilty Monday of murdering three of her estranged husband's relatives by deliberately serving them poisonous mushrooms for lunch.
articles.content:
MELBOURNE, Australia Australian woman Erin Patterson was found guilty Monday of murdering three of her estranged husband's relatives by deliberately serving them poisonous mushrooms for lunch.
